Posts.Content: I am 38 yrs old female - breast cancer survivor sine 2000 - I stayed in remission for 3 yrs - now the cancer is back - mastersized to my lungs since Oct 2003 I had 12 sessions of chemo and 8 weeks of radiation after my mastetomy right side Now I am back on treatment again from once a week to once every 3 weeks I am on Femara one a day and Herceptin and Zomeda I have back pain - my joints hurt early in the morning - especially my hands my big problem right now is lack of sleep ...it's been about 3 months now I have been unable to sleep my doctor gave me meds - but on top of everything I take I don't want to take more meds to sleep - any suggestions Good luck and happy new year to all out there and keep the faith - we are never given more than we can bear - keep your chin up.
Posts.Title: Keep The Faith
